toTask2 API

javadoc for the totask2 application.

Packages 
Package Description
org.regele.totask2
totask2 application.
org.regele.totask2.controller
totask2 controller (springMVC).
org.regele.totask2.model
totask2 data model.
org.regele.totask2.service
cross cutting concerns (reporting security, caching).
org.regele.totask2.util
small utilities and exception classes formatting, conversions, application specific exceptions.
